original_text: And he went down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee. And he was teaching them on the Sabbath,
korean_text: 갈릴리의 가버나움 동네에 내려오사 안식일에 가르치시매

sentences.original_text: And he went down to Capernaum,
And he was teaching them on the Sabbath,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 안식일에 그들을 가르치고 계셨습니다.
